Package jsky.image.operator

Contains JAI based image operator classes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CutLevelDescriptor A single class that is both an OperationDescriptor and a RenderedImageFactory.
ImageOps Utility class for performing image operations.
MinMaxDescriptor A single class that is both an OperationDescriptor and a RenderedImageFactory.
 

Package jsky.image.operator Description

Contains JAI based image operator classes. These are image processing operators, used for setting the cut levels, determining the min and max values (ignoring blanks pixels), etc.
